name: AR GunRange
description:
AR Shooting simulator. This app let you have your very own target practice range within your house or anywhere you wish. Place Targets and practice your aim or play the included challenge!
​
The Challenge Box provides a fun and interactive way to practice you reaction speed, focus and aim. Your score will be recorded and you can follow your improvements over time. Let your friends try and battle each other for the perfect score!
​
Have fun!
